reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: International Crisis Group is generally recognized as the worlds leading independent non-partisan source of analysis and advice to policymakers on the prevention and resolution of deadly conflict. The uniqueness of International Crisis Group is the combina tion of field-based analysis practical policy prescriptions and high level advocacy and it is seen as a trusted source of field-researched information fresh perspectives and advice for conflict parties and external actors. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs s upport to ICG falls under Finland's overall pursuit and actions aimed to advance mediation as core to a more effective international agenda focused on peace and development.
